:Update:: :Update:	... (Date of either last search, change of record as shonw in journal field)
:Send:: :Send:		... (Date and name of last application send, use folder name collections.rst)
:RSS:: :RSS:		... (RSS client and URL, e.g RSSowl from  ?)
:Alert:: :Alert:		... (e-mail to which alert is send and criteria, e.g.: r.w@blue ; criteria_1 ; criteria_2 )
:Terms-Q:: :Terms-Q:	... (Terms for query according to language, see also section Query Terms)
:Queries:: :Queries:	... (URL with specific query terms based on Search-A and Terms-Q)
:Journal:: :Journal:   ... (e.g.: 200209 This happened today ; 200609 Job title I applied to. )
